tool_description: Search discount sports & events inventory that is always below box office price. Guaranteed. Our tickets are always authentic & valid for entry.
name: ScoreBig
title: ScoreBig

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scorebig-scorebig.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scorebig-scorebig.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Event Search

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Free form text for a general search (event, city, venue, performer, etc)

optional_parameters.name: performer_id
optional_parameters.description: IDs of the performers to restrict the search to (home games only)

optional_parameters.name: secondary_performer_id
optional_parameters.description: IDs of the performers to restrict the search to (away games only)

optional_parameters.name: metro_region_id
optional_parameters.description: IDs of the metro regions to restrict the search to.  Multiple metro region IDs should be separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: category_id
optional_parameters.description: IDs of the category to restrict the search to.  Multiple category ids should be separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Only include events after this date and time

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Only include events up to this date and time

optional_parameters.name: deal_rating
optional_parameters.description: Restrict search to certain deal ratings

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.  Default is 200

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Get a list of valid categories.
